structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: Elevator or fixed guideway system work requiring licensed elevator mechanic and supervising general contractor -- Exceptions.

text.section:
Only a licensed elevator mechanic working under the general supervision of an elevator contractor may:
Erect, construct, alter, replace, maintain, remove, or dismantle any elevator or fixed guideway system contained within buildings or structures; or
Wire any elevator or fixed guideway system from the mainline feeder terminals on the controller.

A licensed elevator contractor is not required for removing or dismantling elevators or fixed guideway systems:
That are destroyed as a result of a complete demolition of a secured building or structure; or
Where the hoistway or wellway is demolished back to the basic support structure and does not allow access that could endanger the safety and welfare of a person.

law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 1, effective July 1, 2011.
